full_summary:
======================

**Sir George-Étienne Cartier Parkway - Rockcliffe Park Lighting Rehabilitation (Phase 4)**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006400
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** AL1841

**Public Notice Date:** September 7, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 29, 2022 (3:00 p.m. EDT)

**Description:**
The National Capital Commission invites Alberta-based companies to submit proposals for the Rockcliffe Park Lighting Rehabilitation (Phase 4) project. This project involves the rehabilitation of the Sir George-Étienne Cartier Parkway lighting system.

**Technical Requirements:**
The General Contractor shall have expertise or hire a subcontractor with expertise in both civil and electrical aspects of roads/pathways electrical systems. The contractor is responsible for procuring and installing new materials and equipment, subcontracting related mechanical and/or civil work, and providing warranties.

**Duration of Contract:**
The contract shall be completed within 24 weeks after acceptance.

**Basis of Selection:**
The lowest compliant bidder shall be selected.

**Address Enquiries:**
All inquiries related to this solicitation should be directed to Allan Lapensée, Sr. Procurement Advisor, at [allan.lapensee@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:allan.lapensee@ncc-ccn.ca). Responses will be provided within seven (7) calendar days prior to the tender closing date.

**Site Visit:**
A non-mandatory site visit will take place on Tuesday, September 13, 2022, at 10 a.m. at P3 parking lot, 1170 Sir George-Étienne Cartier Parkway, Ottawa, ON. All costs incurred by the bidder to attend the site visit will be at their expense.

**Submission Instructions:**
Bids must be submitted electronically via email to [Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca). The official Government Electronic Tendering Service website is [https://buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca).

**Attachments:**
Please refer to the solicitation documents, including Addendum 1, for additional information and requirements. [Attachments](#Attachments)
